events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate and are beginning the review process.
The candidate's application has been assigned to the Engineering cluster based on keywords related to software development and engineering experience.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to the candidate to facilitate further communication and scheduling.
The candidate completed the initial phone screening where their technical skills, experience, and motivation for the software engineer role were assessed.
The candidate responded promptly to the invite for the next stages, expressing enthusiasm for the technical interview and the company.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate for next week, focusing on coding challenges and system design relevant to the engineer role.
